hero.title: Build the Future of AI Applications
hero.subtitle: Launch your next AI-powered SaaS application quickly with our modern template. Integrated with the latest tech stack, providing complete development solutions.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: We provide all the features needed to build modern AI SaaS applications, so you can focus on core business logic

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript, providing modern development experience and optimal performance.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Built-in integration with multiple AI services, supporting mainstream AI platforms like OpenAI, Anthropic.

secureAuth.title: Secure Authentication
secureAuth.description: Integrated with Clerk authentication system, providing secure and reliable user management and access control.

modernUI.title: Modern UI
modernUI.description: Based on Tailwind CSS and Radix UI, providing beautiful and accessible user interface components.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language
multiLanguage.description: Built-in internationalization support, easily implement multi-language switching, covering global users.

paymentIntegration.title: Payment Integration
paymentIntegration.description: Integrated with Stripe payment system, supporting subscriptions, one-time payments and other payment modes.

page.title: Choose the Right Plan for You

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about subscriptions and payments

cancel.title: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you can still use paid features until the current billing period ends.

payment.title: What payment methods do you support?
payment.answer: We support all major credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, etc.

yearly.title: What are the benefits of annual plans?
yearly.answer: Annual plans save you 20% compared to monthly billing, equivalent to getting 2+ months free. You also enjoy more stable service experience.

limitations.title: What are the limitations of the free version?
limitations.answer: The free version allows access to 10 use cases, 5 tutorial modules, and 3 blog posts. Upgrade to paid plans to unlock all content and advanced features.

brand.name: AI SaaS Template
brand.description: Professional AI SaaS application development template, providing complete user authentication, payment integration, multi-language support and modern UI components.
brand.slogan: A modern AI SAAS platform built with Next.js 15 and React 19

blocks.title: Component Library
blocks.description: Explore our carefully designed component collection, each optimized for direct use in your projects
blocks.categoriesDescription: Browse our carefully designed component library by category and quickly find what you need
blocks.startUsingDescription: All components support TypeScript and are fully responsive. Just copy the code and start using.

pricingPage.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingPage.description: We offer flexible pricing plans to meet the needs of individual users to enterprise customers. All plans include core AI features and can be upgraded at any time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about pricing and services.

cancel.title: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you can still use the service until the end of the current billing period.

payment.title: What payment methods are supported?
payment.answer: We support multiple payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and Alipay, all securely processed through Stripe.

upgrade.title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: Of course. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time in your account settings, and the cost will be prorated.

trial.title: How long is the free trial?
trial.answer: All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial, during which you can use all features for free.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Our customer service team is always here to answer your questions.

blocksCategoryPage.noComponents: No components in this category yet. Stay tuned!
blocksCategoryPage.exploreMore: Explore other categories to discover more beautiful components

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - AI SaaS Template
metadata.description: Learn how AI SaaS Template collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy rights.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We value and protect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: AI SaaS Template is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information security. We adhere to the highest privacy protection standards to ensure your data is handled properly.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
content: We collect information you actively provide, such as your name and email address when registering an account.
We automatically collect technical information, including IP address, browser type, device information, etc.
We use analytics data to help us improve service quality.
We collect information through cookies and similar technologies.

informationUse.title: Information Use
content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services.
We process transactions and send related notifications.
We respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
We send important updates and marketing information (you can opt-out).
We prevent fraud and ensure the security of our services.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
We may share necessary information with service providers to deliver our services.
We may disclose information when required by law or to protect rights.
In the event of a business transfer, information may be transferred as part of the assets.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
content: We use industry-standard encryption technologies to protect data transmission.
We implement strict access controls and authentication measures.
We conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
Employees receive training on privacy and security.
Data backup and disaster recovery plans are in place.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
content: Your information may be processed outside of your country/region.
We ensure that cross-border data transfers comply with applicable laws and regulations.
Appropriate safeguards are in place to ensure data security.
We comply with relevant privacy regulations such as GDPR and CCPA.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary.
After account deletion, we will delete relevant data within a reasonable timeframe.
Certain information may need to be retained for a longer period due to legal requirements.
You can request the deletion of your personal information at any time.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: Under applicable privacy laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal information.

access.title: Access Rights
access.description: You have the right to know what personal information we have collected about you.

correction.title: Correction Rights
correction.description: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information.

deletion.title: Deletion Rights
deletion.description: In certain circumstances, you can request the deletion of your personal information.

restriction.title: Restriction Rights
restriction.description: You can request the restriction of processing your personal information.

portability.title: Data Portability Rights
portability.description: You have the right to obtain your data in a structured, commonly used format.

objection.title: Objection Rights
objection.description: You can object to the processing of your personal information based on legitimate interests.

contact.title: Have privacy-related questions?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please feel free to contact us.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or on our website. We recommend that you periodically review this policy for the latest information.

paymentSuccess.paymentProcessingSubtitle: Your payment is being processed, please check your membership status later.

paymentCancelled.title: Payment Canceled
paymentCancelled.description: Your payment has been canceled, and no charges were made.
paymentCancelled.paymentIssuesDescription: If you're experiencing technical issues during payment, please try refreshing the page or using a different payment method.
paymentCancelled.moreInfoDescription: You can view our pricing details or contact customer support for more information about membership plans.
paymentCancelled.tryAgainDescription: You can return to the pricing page at any time to choose a suitable membership plan.
paymentCancelled.whyCancelledDescription: Payment may have been interrupted due to network issues, card restrictions, or if you manually canceled it.
paymentCancelled.willBeChargedDescription: No, canceled payments will not result in any charges.
paymentCancelled.howToRetry: How can I try paying again?
paymentCancelled.howToRetryDescription: You can go back to the pricing page and select a membership plan to try paying again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! This is your personal workspace.
